results.title: Simvastatin and Atorvastatin inhibit DNA replication licensing factor MCM7 and effectively suppress RB-deficient tumors growth
results.text_hl: Our finding will broaden the application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SVA@@@ or @GENE_CYP19A1 @GENE_1588 @@@ARO@@@ to @<m>DISEASE_Retinoblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012175 @@@RB@@@-deficient @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ therapy.
